short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find relevant jobs in less time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See if a LinkedIn job is relevant at a glance:

1. Add the keywords you usually look for in promising job descriptions.
2. The extension will instantly tell you how many times those keywords appear.
3. If the job seems relevant, you can save it and track updates on your application.

Say goodbye to hours spent reading job descriptions!
